name: html-pagination
description: Package for html document pagination to fit container with fixed width

scripts.test:browser: npm run build -- --module 'esnext' && cp ./src/__tests__/index.html ./lib/ && bash -c 'for module in ".\/cache" ".\/types" ".\/utils"; do sed -i "s/$module/$module.js/g" ./lib/index.js; done' && serve -s lib
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src

author: dm1sh
